text: يُجَـٰدِلُونَكَ فِى ٱلْحَقِّ بَعْدَ مَا تَبَيَّنَ كَأَنَّمَا يُسَاقُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَوْتِ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Arguing with you concerning the truth after it had become clear, as if they were being driven toward death while they were looking on.
translation.id.indonesian: mereka membantahmu tentang kebenaran sesudah nyata (bahwa mereka pasti menang), seolah-olah mereka dihalau kepada kematian, sedang mereka melihat (sebab-sebab kematian itu).
